subject: Reading formula from Excel sheet
body:
Hello there!

Is there a way to read to read formula from MS Excel sheet without
using OLE. I can use the OLE but annoying pop-ups for updating link
while opening and saving the file while quitting keeps coming. I would
appreciate any kind of solution. Thank you in advance.


--
